English: the Yongjiang river `甬~`江~[Yong3 jiang1] through Ningbo `寧~`波~|`宁~`波~[Ning2 bo1]

d.f: `兩旁~`有~`牆壁~`遮蔽~`的~`通道~。`參見~「`甬道~」`條~。
`浙江省~`鄞縣~`的~`別稱~，`因~`甬~`江流~`經~`而~`得名~。

English: the Yongjiang river `甬~`江~[Yong3 jiang1] through Ningbo `寧~`波~|`宁~`波~[Ning2 bo1]
(classifier) cubic dry measure (5 pecks `五~`斗~, approx half-liter)
path screened by walls on both sides
